name: BMC (Blue Mountain Cigars) - Dipped - French Chocolate - Robusto
brand: BMC (Blue Mountain Cigars), Dipped, French Chocolate
additionalNotes:
Blue Mountain Cigars is a family owned & operated business dedicated to uncompromising quality and customer satisfaction. In April 1995 cigar connoisseur and entrepreneur Marvin Wright started a cigars factory with his wife Jacqueline. Born and raised in Jamaica, Marvin was the son of an entrepreneur 
Today in Nicaragua Marvin utilizes many of the old Jamaican traditions in cigars making, combined with many of the techniques and philosophies he learned from growers and master blenders Cuba.
